text:
The ‘WAGS LA’ premiere is only a few days away! HollywoodLife.com has an EXCLUSIVE preview of the Nov. 5 episode. Nicole is all about wedding planning, but Larry is really feeling the pressure.

After 5 years of being together, Nicole Williams, 31, is beyond ready to plan her wedding to NFL player Larry English, 31. She wants to go all-out for her dream wedding. She starts talking to Larry about a bridal shower, bachelorette, bachelor, and an engagement party all before the wedding even happens. “I don’t remember going to all these different, separate things for the wedding,” Larry says to Nicole. Larry’s getting a little stressed, to say the least. “I don’t have time to like sit and plan yet another thing to attach to the whole wedding,” he continues.

Nicole gets a little peeved about Larry’s words about wedding planning. He’s put the ring on it, and he thinks Nicole should handle the rest. But Nicole is not letting him get out of wedding planning. She starts to tell him about how she wants all the wedding guests to wear black. She also doesn’t want to do vows and wonders if they should have vegan options on the reception. “All the pressure and all the decision-making is basically on me, and it would just be nice if I could have more of Larry’s help because I just can’t handle stress very well,” Nicole says.

WAGS LA returns for a third season with new faces Amber Nichole Miller, Dominique Penn, and Michelle Quick on Sunday, November 5th at 10p ET/PT. This is the synopsis for season 3: Sasha Gates also prepares for big changes as she relocates her family permanently with the Chargers move to LA. Meanwhile, Autumn Ajirotutu struggles to repair severed ties within the group, and officially single, Natalie Halcro and Olivia Pierson are haunted by their romantic pasts and uncover fractured friendships of their own. Barbie Blank’s friendship with model/actress Amber Nichole Miller (girlfriend to former MMA Light Heavyweight champion Tito Ortiz) continues to develop despite Amber’s growing tensions with the rest of the ladies. Additionally, self-proclaimed “momprenuer” Dominique Penn (married to offensive lineman Donald Penn) tries to navigate the rocky relationship between her close friends Autumn and Sasha, as Michelle Quick (wife of wide receiver Brian Quick) transitions her family from LA to Washington following the latest trade announcements.”

HollywoodLifers, are you excited for the new season of WAGS LA? Let us know!
title: ‘WAGS LA’ Sneak Peek: Nicole’s Intense Wedding Planning Overwhelms Larry — Watch
